column1: [KEEP THIS LINE] [must have at least 1 held item, 1 non-held item]

column13: Your opponent sends you a pic of a random Pokemon. If you correctly spell its name, earn $30.
Every time the shop refreshes, you get +1 Next Battle Only choice (Next Battle Only items are unavailable on the final round).
Next battle only: Do a singles battle instead of a doubles battle.
Next battle only: Swap your and your opponent's [nth] Pokemon.
